title: Inference Is Table Stakes. That's a Good Thing for Ampere
author: Alex Williams
description: The semiconductor company is focused on enabling cloud native AI app development, improving performance at scale and silencing "noisy neighbors."
cntitle: 推理是赌注。这对 Ampere 来说是件好事
cndescription: 这家半导体公司专注于支持云原生 AI 应用程序开发，提高规模化性能并消除“嘈杂邻居”。
